column5: Hi all, really felt like spring yesterday. Still some ice on the lake but it will be gone by the end of the week for sure, if not sooner. Wet a line with Jack last night after workâ€¦.BLISS! Had some marshmallows and a few fireworks.  Fishing was sloooooow, without a hint of a walleye but i got a nice 34" pike and a fat, ready to burst perch.
Great stuff Simon! Sure didn't take the loons very long to arrive.
Awesome! Nice pike dood! My boy started on one of those rocket rods too lol. Looks like an awesome evening wit the family:)
Also, for around here that perch is rediculous!
Looks like you had a great weekend.  Nice fish, glad some of your ice is gone ours will will be here for a little while longer, thanks also for the birthday greetings Cheers Blizz
Beautiful, enjoy your spring while the blackflies are still asleep
